ExpenseForm.title: Add expense
ExpenseForm.description: Add expense to the list of expenses.

schema.description: The description must be at least 4 and maximum 16 characters.
schema.amount: The amount must be between 0.01 and 100.000.

add.title: Add user
add.description: Add a user to the users list.

edit.title: Edit user
edit.description: Edit the selected user and update the list.

schema.name: The name must be at least 4 characters long.
schema.username_min: The username must be at least 4 characters long.
schema.username_max: The username must be maximum 16 characters long.
schema.username_case: The username must be alphanumeric, also _-. are allowed.
schema.email: Please enter a valid email address.
